sentences.sCn: …参加大学校际体育运动的学生们。

sentences.sContent: ...both measures of a school's commitment to athletics are significantly...
...Researchers find that there is a positive relationship between a school's commitment to athletics and academic achievements...
...Despite negative stereotypes about sports culture and Ripley's presumption that academics and athletics are at odds with one another...
...all of whom emphasize athletics far less in school...
...we would expect to see a negative relationship between the commitment to athletics and academic achievement...
...many American students would still have opportunities to participate in organized athletics elsewhere...
...James Coleman suggests in his earlier writings that school athletics would undermine a school's image...
...Coleman in his early work held athletics in contempt...
